alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 9:26PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River at the following locations... Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Canton. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.7 feet, In La Grange, 2nd Street floods between Green St. and Lewis St. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 18.8 feet early Monday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Mississippi River Canton 15.0 15.0 15.9 16.8 17.5 18.2 18.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
